overview: Three men meet in a secluded barn in the country to fulfill a contact each one signed fifteen years ago to enrich their lives. Their task simple, entertain their host with a good tale. Fail and he takes your soul. An anthology including Paulin's Sacrificial Birth (1990), Final Scream (1990), and The Shifters (1991). Also a brand new wrap around story and over-the-top ending.
title: Morbid Tales
